data.name: Gerhardt, the Lone and Proud
data.notes: "Gerhardt, the Lone and Proud" resides in Whale's Nostril, a tunnel in the south of Noctilum. It may take some seconds but Gerhardt will drop down out of thin air under a short bridge in the cave while passing by underneath (it attempts to block in BLADE operatives after they check the nearby vehicle wreckage).
